Gylan Kain (mgbe ụfọdụ naanị KAIN, Kain ma ọ bụ Kain the Poet) bụ onye America na-ede abụ na onye na-ede egwuregwu
Ọ bụ onye guzobere, n'afọ 1968, nke Original Last Poets (ya na Abiodun Oyewole na David Nelson, ya na Felipe Luciano gbakwunyere n'oge na-adịghị anya)
Kain n'onwe ya kere ihe ike, nnyefe ụda nke okwu ọnụ aka uri arụmọrụ dị ka a maara ya taa
Ọ na-ejikarị aka ma ọ bụ na-akwado ndị egwu dị ka onye saxophonists na bass guitarists.
Ndị na-ese ihe a ma ama gụnyere Dr
Dre na The Prodigy gosipụtara ọrụ ya n'enweghị nkwenye
[nkọwa dị mkpa] Otu n'ime ihe omume ya gosipụtara na klọb Voodoo People nke The Prodigy
Dre gosipụtara akụkụ nke Kain na-abụ abụ ya, "The Shalimar" na egwu Dre nke akpọrọ "Intro" site na abọm akpọrọ "The Chronic"

Mgbe e mechara ihe iwu kwadoro nke ọma iji nweta ụgwọ maka ọrụ nke The Prodigy gosipụtara, ndị na-ekwuchitere The Prodigy kwuru na e meela mgbalị iji nweta ikike n'aka Kain maka iji ọrụ ya mana mbọ ndị ahụ enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma n'ihi na Kain, onye ji nzuzo kpọrọ ihe, enweghị ike ịchọta n'oge
Dre akwụbeghị Kain ụgwọ maka ọrụ e gosipụtara n'enweghị nkwenye dị mkpa]
Nke a emeela ka ụfọdụ ndị na-akwado [onye?] katọọ Dr
Dre dị ka onye ihu abụọ maka iji ọrụ nke onye na-ese ihe ojii nwere mmetụta mgbe o wusịrị aha dị ka ike na-enye ike na obodo ndị isi ojii America dị ka onye guzobere N.W.A

Kain emeela mmekorita multimedia na onye na-eti egwu Z'EV ma pụta na Dutch jazz / hip-hop / fusion otu Electric Barbarian, na-apụta na abọm egwu ha nke afọ 2004 él. Ọ bụkwa isiokwu nke ọtụtụ ihe nkiri.
Nwa ya nwanyị, Amber Kain, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Nwa ya nwoke bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Khalil Kain, onye a maara nke ọma maka ịpụta dịka "Raheem" n'afọ 1992 crime thriller Juice featuring 2Pac
